issue.title: online-fix.me
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.7

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://online-fix.me/

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

these domains appear in my dns log:

tds.mediapays.info
dotofverse.com
trutheyesstab.com
myroledance.com

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: forgot to mention these arent analytics they are spam/ad domains

issue.title: com.dragon.read

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.7nightly 12

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://ugapk.com/5Qdh?channel_from=zlink

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

我是想要提供几条规则到adguard dns过滤器中，经过我的测试，拦截广告有效。我使用番茄小说APP时，每隔一段时间便有广告出现，你们现在的规则对这个APP无效。番茄小说APP的下载链接是https://ugapk.com/5Qdh?channel_from=zlink
我想要提供的规则是  ||zijie*   和  ||frontier100-toutiao-lf.fqnovel.com^。
没有使用上面两条规则拦截时：
[微信图片_20241007230501](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/d3d984ed-644c-4621-b83b-44044a2f23ec)
使用上面两条规则拦截时：
[微信图片_20241007230510](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/91462959-60bb-4a0c-9922-d1ec27570a28)




### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
> Check after an hour. Then clear the filtering log, reproduce, and make screenshots of the log, when you search for `zijieapi.com`

After you fix the wrong rule, help me solve this problem. Waited for days without processing.

https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/190503
